text:
@WhiteHouse @HouseGOP Why on earth does donald j trump keep lying about Mexico and their response to coronavirus epidemic

Could it be that he does not want people to know that
Mexico is fending off the virus 16 better than is the USA

deaths per million people
Mexico ......9 
USA .......162 

Wow !
